name: General's Ancient Helm
title: Ironclad Promise: General's Ancient Helm
desc: "The last drop of blood had soaked into the battlefield, and the glazed sands shone gloriously once more."
inPlayDescription: When Action Phase begins: The character to which this is attached gains Unmovable Mountain that provides 2 Shield points.

skills.desc:
When Action Phase begins: The character to which this is attached gains Unmovable Mountain that provides 2 Shield points.
